item.title: Drinking from the Firehose: using R to keep up with current ML Research - part 1
item.description: via GIPHY In this post, I will explore how we can use resources available in the R package ecosystem to keep up with state-of-the-art machine learning research. Motivation Recently, I have been reading books about creativity. The recurring concept in the books is that the key place to start when mastering a skill is by reproducing other peopleâ€™s proven ideas and figuring out their inner workings - a form of apprenticeship.
